main.name: Jnani Kumar
main.description: I am a reactjs and django developer ,I also integrate ML models into Web Apps
main.bio: Hi there! I am jnani  I've been coding for over 1 year now. I havebeen working on webdevelopment as well as machine learning , I've worked with startups to help build & scale their companies. Along the journey I realised my passion existed in helping others excel and pursue their dreams

education.degree: Bachelor's Degree, Mechanical and Minor in Computer Applications

projects.title: Gmail Application
projects.description: This is the clone of Gmail which looks similar to Gmail application , there is a proper Authentication System ,  and the authenticated users can send mails to the other users, this applications was developed using Reactjs and deployed on firebase

projects.title: Chatting with friends
projects.description: This is a simple chat application for group chat which is developed using reactjs and firsbase and the project was deployed on firebase

projects.title: Answering some questions
projects.description: This is a web App designed using HTML, CSS and JavaScript , which was deployed on github , The users can find their accuracy after completing the quiz .

projects.title: Weather of a particular city
projects.description: this is a webApp In which we can find the temperature details of city by typing in the city name,this  was  deployed on firebase

projects.title: this website is all about my accomplishments
projects.description: This is my personal portfolio website of all my achievements and accomplishments , which is built up on top of Reactjs and deployed on firebase.

projects.title: Todo List web app
projects.description: this web app is user Authenticated and the authenticated user can check their status of their works and deadlines and can also add works and deadlines

projects.title: Updates on covid19
projects.description: We can get the latest updates on covid from this web app , this is kind of dashboard

testimonials.text: Sonny is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Sonny has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
